alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Eastern Ascension; St. James; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 02 at 5:23AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN ASCENSION, NORTHWESTERN ST. JAMES AND ASSUMPTION PARISHES THROUGH 615 AM CST... At 523 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Belle River, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Napoleonville, Gramercy, Lutcher, Sorrento, Paincourtville, Convent, and Belle Rose. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 178 and 189. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Eastern Ascension; St. James; Western Ascension
